description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in 115cms up to 20240807. This affects an unknown part of the file /index.php/admin/web/appurladd.html. The manipulation of the argument tid leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
